channel.title: Pharmacodynamics on Mycobacterial Infection Research Unit
channel.description: Recent content in Pharmacodynamics on Mycobacterial Infection Research Unit

item.title: LEVEL-UP-TB
item.description:
Tuberculosis therapy is usuallay administered in weight adapted doses. However, factors like fast-metabolizing enzymes, malabsorption, and drug interactions can influence their serum drug levels. This is not yet taken into account as part of the clinical routine or therapeutic guidelines.


The LEVEL-UP-TB project evaluates different factors predicting serum drug levels of antimycobacterial therapy as well as their influence on therapeutic outcome.

Contact PI
